A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved it! It was fresh\, emotional\, surprising\, exciting and still so very clearly Star Wars. I was positively surprised by some of the new characters in the episode but Adam Driver as Kylo Ren/Ben Solo definitely stole the whole show. He was amazing! Special mention to Daisy Ridley as well! The movie might require some people to see it a few times to process everything..and be open minded! I think there are now many interesting directions where they can take the saga in the next movie.
